description: The River Wattle (Acacia Cognata 'Mini Cog') is an amazing Australian native. Its evergreen foliage and vase-like form make it an eye-catching addition to any yard. Its petite size also makes it an ideal choice for small yards or low-maintenance gardens. Its vibrant green foliage, with its soft and delicate yellow flowers, provides a great pop of color. This plant does best in sunny location and requires minimal to no water. It's also a great choice for smaller gardens as it doesn't need too much pruning and can be left to grow naturally. All of these qualities make the River Wattle one of the best and most low maintenance plants to add color and life to any outdoor space.
